article_title: California Company Recalls Cucumbers Amid Deadly Salmonella Outbreak
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: california, company, recalls, cucumbers, amid, deadly, salmonella, outbreak

og.description: A California produce company is recalling cucumbers imported from Mexico amid concerns they could be the source of a salmonella outbreak, authorities said.
